import { Heading, Button, Paragraph, FadeIn, simpleWrapper, Container } from '../components/S' import HeaderDescription from '../components/HeaderDescription' import Head from 'next/head' import useTranslation from '../hooks/useTranslation' export default () => { const { t } = useTranslation() const overview = { dangerouslySetInnerHTML: { __html: t('overview', 'aboutPage') }, } const bio = { dangerouslySetInnerHTML: { __html: t('bio', 'aboutPage') }, } const contact = { dangerouslySetInnerHTML: { __html: t('contact', 'aboutPage') }, } return (
{t('welcome', 'aboutPage')}



nCorona's BIO
) }
